original_text: Then some people brought their little children to Jesus. They wanted him to put his hands on each child's head. They wanted him to pray for them. But the disciples told the people that they should not do that.
korean_text: 그 때에 사람들이 예수께서 안수하고 기도해 주심을 바라고 어린 아이들을 데리고 오매 제자들이 꾸짖거늘

sentences.original_text: Then some people brought their little children to Jesus
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 어떤 사람들이 자기들의 어린 아이들을 예수께 데려왔습니다

sentences.original_text: They wanted him to put his hands on each child's head
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 예수께 각 아이들의 머리에 손을 얹어주시기를 원했습니다

sentences.original_text: They wanted him to pray for them
But the disciples told the people
that they should not do that
